title: Why does my build not work after upgrading from 4 to 5?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I upgraded from Unity 4 to Unity 5
  • I can no longer build my game to iOS/Android platforms

sections.title: Cause
content: You have created a project using Unity 4 and build this scene for iOS/Android successfully in the UI system.
You have then upgraded to Unity 5 and when you load your project, you are not able to build to iOS/Android as the UI system is not working anymore.

sections.title: Resolution
content: The UI system in Unity 4 and 5 are slightly different. If you created a game in Unity 4, you can create a duplicate of the project for Unity 5.

If you were previously using assets from the Asset Store in your Unity 4 project you will need to completely remove these from the duplicate project and download the newest versions of each asset and re-import them into your Unity 5 project.

sections.title: More Information
content: To update your purchased assets then see this article here.
